form.heading: Please tell us a bit about yourself
form.pleaseAgree: To create your account, you need to agree with our terms of service and privacy policy
form.agreement: I agree with the terms of service and privacy policy

confirmation.heading: Nice to meet you, {{name}}! We'll send a greeting to the address below. Is it fine?

completed.heading: Please check your mailbox!
completed.mainGuidance: We have sent a message with a link to setup your account to {{email}}
completed.notReceiving: In case you do not receive the email
completed.notReceivingGuidance: Please check the spam mail folder and the address you entered. If you still can not find it, you can try again from the beginning.
